Ah, the sweet smell of Ravens fanbase jealousy. 4 Lombardi's and counting; no tears here in NE.
You real football fans in Baltimore know a better team when you see one.
Also, [glass houses](http://yourteamcheats.com/BAL).

I think if you picked one animal per day/week/month or whatever timetable you pick, that would be fine. Have that thread always be at the top of this sub and people can click it or not click it. I don't know why people think that would be intrusive or change the point of this sub. When a major corporation sells goods but then also has fundraisers, it doesn't mean they are no longer a corporation selling goods. It is OK to have 99.99% of this page be feel good posts, with a single post always being there if you want to donate.
As long as it's a single link and you don't allow other people to post links for funding, it really isn't a big deal and will save lives.
I don't know about everyone else but seeing before n after pics or anything rescue related always makes me want to donate at that moment. Why not have a convenient place for people who feel the same?
Let's do some good people!
